src:
Gareth Bale dan James Rodriguez Kompak Bolos Latihan Real Madrid
01 Nov 2019, 10:25 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Gareth Bale dan James Rodriguez bakal terus menjadi perhatian di antara pemain Real Madrid lain. Kabar terbaru, kedua pemain kompak bolos sesi latihan Real Madrid yang digelar Kamis (31/10/2019) waktu setempat.
Tengah pekan ini, Real Madrid memainkan laga pekan ke-11 La Liga 2019/2020 melawan Leganes. Llaga digelar pada Rabu (30/10/2019) waktu setempat. Real Madrid menang dengan skor 5-0 pada laga di Bernabeu.
Tidak ada nama Gareth Bale dan James Rodriguez dalam daftar susunan pemain inti di laga tersebut. Bahkan, kedua pemain juga tidak masuk dalam daftar pemain cadangan pilihan Zinedine Zidane.
Nama Gareth Bale dan James memang terus menjadi sorotan media. Sebab, keduanya dinilai sudah tidak lagi punya masa depan di Real Madrid. Klub diyakini sangat ingin melepas mereka berdua.
text:
Gareth Bale and James Rodriguez Compact Skip Skills Real Madrid
Nov 1, 2019, 10:25 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Gareth Bale and James Rodriguez will continue to be a concern among other Real Madrid players. The latest news, the two players skipped the Real Madrid training session which was held on Thursday (10/31/2019) local time.
This weekend, Real Madrid plays Week 11 of La Liga 2019/2020 against Leganes. Llaga was held on Wednesday (10/30/2019) local time. Real Madrid won 5-0 in the match at the Bernabeu.
There are no names Gareth Bale and James Rodriguez in the list of core players in the match. In fact, the two players are also not included in the list of selected reserve players Zinedine Zidane.
The names Gareth Bale and James continue to be in the media spotlight. Because, both are considered to no longer have a future at Real Madrid. The club is believed to be eager to release them both.
